mutants.code:
def entance(a, b):
    a = abs(a)
    b = abs(b)
    return entance(b, a * b) if b else a

mutants.code:
def entance(a, b):
    a = abs(a)
    b = abs(b)
    return entance(b, a + b) if b else a
